CustomField.description: Method in which this particular backlog item has been implemented: BAU (Business as Usual) - no prior approval SIR (Salesforce Immediate Release) - approved immediate release Packaged Release - promoted within a normal release window
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Refers to the type of change made to the production instance. None - No changes released into production for this item. BAU - No prior approval required (notifies dev & qa) SIR - Approved immediate release Packaged Release - Normal release conditions
CustomField.label: Release Type
